Method Detail

run

java.lang.String run(SPF1Data spfData)
                     throws PermErrorException,
                            TempErrorException
Run the mechanismn with the give SPF1Data

Parameters:
spfData - The SPF1Data we should use
Returns:
host The host we should redirect / include
Throws:
PermErrorException - Get thrown if there are any errors in modifiers
TempErrorException - Get thrown if DNS problems detected

enforceSingleInstance

boolean enforceSingleInstance()
Returns:
true if only one instance of this modifier is allowed
